User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the platform.

status.description: The status of the user's account.

createdAt.description: The date and time the user was created.

Store.title: Store
Store.description: Represents a merchant's store on the platform.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns the store.

status.description: The current status of the store.

plan.description: The subscription plan of the store.

createdAt.description: The date and time the store was created.

image.description: URL of the store's logo or image.

Plan.title: Plan
Plan.description: Represents a subscription plan for merchants.

name.description: The name of the subscription plan.

price.description: The monthly price of the plan.

features.description: A comma-separated string of plan features.

createdAt.description: The date and time the plan was created.

Coupon.title: Coupon
Coupon.description: Represents a discount coupon for stores.

code.description: The unique code for the coupon.

type.description: The type of discount (percentage or fixed amount).

status.description: The current status of the coupon.

expiryDate.description: The expiration date of the coupon.

createdAt.description: The date and time the coupon was created.

Product.title: Product
Product.description: A product in a merchant's store.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: A product category for a merchant's store.

Brand.title: Brand
Brand.description: A product brand for a merchant's store.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: A customer order from a merchant's store.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: A customer of a merchant's store.

MerchantCoupon.title: MerchantCoupon
MerchantCoupon.description: A discount coupon created by a merchant for their store.

MerchantNotification.title: MerchantNotification
MerchantNotification.description: A notification sent by a merchant to their customers.

/stores/{storeId}.description: Stores general information about a merchant's store.

/plans/{planId}.description: Stores subscription plan information for admins.

/coupons/{couponId}.description: Stores platform-wide discount coupons for admins.

/stores/{storeId}/products/{productId}.description: Stores products for a specific merchant.

/stores/{storeId}/categories/{categoryId.description: Stores product categories for a specific merchant.

/stores/{storeId}/brands/{brandId}.description: Stores product brands for a specific merchant.

/stores/{storeId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores customer orders for a specific merchant.

/stores/{storeId}/customers/{customerId}.description: Stores customer information for a specific merchant.

/stores/{storeId}/coupons/{couponId}.description: Stores coupons created by a specific merchant.

/stores/{storeId}/notifications/{notific.description: Stores notifications sent by a specific merchant.
